course_name: Principles of Business Management and Leadership
description: The course introduces current supervisors, new managers and future leaders to a number of key principles required for having a good understanding of the key issues and strategies for managing the individual, group and organisational challenges that they will face, almost daily. The course provides specific areas of foundational knowledge, skills and insights that can be built further on through other courses, especially on leadership, leading teams, strategy and change management.
restricted:
Restricted to students in the GCBLead program. 
Quota: minimum of 10 enrolments. UQ reserves the right to limit the number of participants from any one organisation.
